Hotel.name: BE LIVE COLLECTION PUNTA CANA ADULTS ONLY

Address.Address1: Carretera Cabeza de Toro Km 7, Punta Cana 23000,

Message.Text:
Essential Information: Room 1
Hotel Tariff Notes: No show and early departure will be subjected to 100% charge. No date, name and room change allowed Note: In the event of a declared Hurricane warning affecting the region, prior to arrival (up to 36-72 hours): 1. Be Live Hotels will waive any cancellation and/or “no show” penalties for reservations cancelled as a result of a hurricane affecting the area. Written notification must be received by the Tour Operator. 2. The Hotel will waive room charges for unused nights as a result of early departures. This policy will apply to category 1 and higher hurricanes as officially reported by the National Weather Service. IMPORTANT NOTE: Tariff NOT applicable for Dominican Republic Nationals NOTA IMPORTANTE: Tarifas no aplicables para ciudadanos de la Republica Dominicana In case of Hurricanes, please contact Hurricanes Policy provided by the Hotel.
